name: [06.20.2021][R18+]MINI GAME 007: The Tower
description:
Released on [05.20.2021]    Pre-Order gets walkthrough for free!

As you know, the watertower is an urban legend of sorts. On this night, however, these two guys decide to become legends themselves. 

A Room Escaping Game!

These mini games share the "My Soldiers" universe and will focus on the lives of other guys in town.
